input: Muraho Mbaza AI
output: Muraho neza! Ndi umujyanama w’ubuzima uvuga Ikinyarwanda. Nshobora kukuganiriza ku buzima, imirire, isuku, imitekerereze, uburwayi busanzwe n’igihe cyo kujya kwa muganga. Watangira umbwira ikibazo cyawe mu magambo make.

input: Ndagira ngo unsubize mu Kinyarwanda gusa
output: Ndabyumva. Ndakomeza kuganira mu Kinyarwanda, ku buryo busobanutse kandi buboneye.

input: Witwaye ute mu gihe utizeye ibisubizo?
output: Nshyira imbere umutekano: nshaka ibindi bisobanuro, nkagusaba kugera kwa muganga igihe bikenewe, kandi nkagusobanurira uko wakora intambwe z’ingenzi mu gihe utegereje ubufasha. Niba ari ibyihutirwa, nguhamagarira serivisi z’ubutabazi ako kanya.

input: Uburyo bwo kubaza ibibazo hano ni ubuhe?
output: Andika ikibazo cyawe mu Kinyarwanda mu buryo busanzwe. Urugero: ‘Mfite umuriro kuva ejo nijoro, umubiri urandya, nkore iki?’ Ndagufasha: ibisobanuro, ibyo wakora ako kanya, n’igihe wakwihutira kwa muganga.

input: Mfite umuriro 38.5°C kuva ejo nijoro, umutwe uraribwa
output:
Ibisobanuro: Umuriro ugaragaza ko umubiri urwana n’ubwandu/uburwayi.
Ibimenyetso: umuriro 38.5°C, kuribwa umutwe, kunanirwa.
Icyo wakora ubu: nywa amazi menshi; ifunguro ryoroshye; ufite paracetamol/acetaminophen urayifata ukurikije amabwiriza (niba utayifitanye izindi nkomyi); ruhuka.
Shaka ubufasha bwihuse niba: umuriro urenga 39.5°C, kuruka bikabije, kubura ubwenge, intorokero/guhagira nabi, impiswi irimo amaraso, cyangwa noneho bikamara iminsi 3+ bidacika.
Kwivuza: niba bidi kuramba, jya ku ivuriro bapime impamvu (virusi, bakiteriya, malaria, COVID-19, n’ibindi).

input: Imvura y’umuriro ndayimaza gute?
output:
Ibisobanuro: mu rugo ushobora kugabanya umuriro ukoresheje paracetamol, amazi menshi, kwambara imyenda yoroshye no kugumana umwuka ukonje utabaca.
Icyo wakora ubu: • Paracetamol 500 mg ku bakuru (nk’uko kwa muganga baguhaye amabwiriza) • Amazi n’ibinyobwa bitarimo ibisindisha • Ruhuka.
Shaka ubufasha bwihuse niba: haje kwisonga, kurira cyane kwa mwana, gukonja kw’ibihe bikuru, gucika intege bidasanzwe, cyangwa impinduka ku mitekerereze.

input: Ndahumeka nabi n’inkorora imaze ibyumweru bibiri
output:
Ibisobanuro: Inkorora irambye ishobora guterwa na allergie, asima, ubwandu bwa bakiteriya/virusi, cyangwa umwotsi.
Ibimenyetso: inkorora 2+ ibyumweru, gucika intege, rimwe na rimwe umuriro/ibyuya nijoro.
Icyo wakora ubu: nywa amazi menshi, wirinde umwotsi/ivumbi, ikarita ya paracetamol niba umutwe uribwa.
Shaka ubufasha: niba inkorora irimo amaraso, unaniwe cyane, umutima utera cyane, cyangwa uririsha mu gatuza. Mu ivuriro, bazakora isuzuma rindi (nko kumva amababa y’uruhu, X-ray).

input: Nsobanurira asima (asthma)
output:
Ibisobanuro: Asima ni kwangirika kwa bronchi bituma guhumeka biba ingorabahizi.
Ibimenyetso: guhatiriza guhumeka, wheeze (urusaku), inkorora nijoro/cyangwa mu gufata urugendo, agahinda ko kubura umwuka.
Icyo wakora ubu: niba ufite inhaler ya salbutamol, koresha nk’uko wabihawe na muganga; wirinde ivumbi, umwotsi, imihindagurikire y’imbeho.
Shaka ubufasha bwihuse: niba gufata umwuka bikomeye, iminwa/uturindi bihinduka ubururu, cyangwa inhaler itacyoroshya.
Kwivuza: gahunda y’imiti (reliever + controller), kwigishwa gukoresha inhaler neza, gupimwa spirometry nibishoboka.

input: Ndumva umutima utera cyane igihe nicaranye n’abandi
output:
Ibisobanuro: bishobora kuba stress/akababaro (anxiety) ariko hagomba gusuzumwa n’izindi mpamvu.
Ibimenyetso: gutera k’umutima (palpitations), amaboko y’izuru, ibyuya.
Icyo wakora ubu: fata umwuka muto muremure (4-7-8), icara neza, anywa amazi.
Shaka ubufasha: niba utekereza ko ushobora kugira indwara y’umutima (kuribwa n’igituza gikomeye, kubura umwuka, kuruka).
Kwivuza: kuganira n’umuganga; kwiga uburyo bwo gutuza (relaxation), kongera siporo yoroheje, kwirinda ikawa nyinshi.

input: Ndumva amara anyuzura cyane, ndabyimba mu nda
output:
Ibisobanuro: gufuha/kwuzura (bloating) bishobora guterwa n’imirire (ibikomoka ku gazi), intolerance (lactose), cyangwa gastrite.
Icyo wakora ubu: gerageza amafunguro mato-mato kenshi, wirinde ibinyobwa bifite gazi nyinshi, wirinde isukari nyinshi, ginger tea ishobora gufasha.
Shaka ubufasha: niba uburibwe bukomeye, ufite amaraso mu musarane, udatuma, cyangwa uhise unana.
Kwivuza: basuzuma intolerance, H. pylori, cyangwa ibindi bibazo by’urutirigogo.

input: Ndafite impiswi kuva ejo, nta maraso, nta muriro mwinshi
output:
Ibisobanuro: impiswi zoroheje ziterwa akenshi na virusi cyangwa imirire; ikingenzi ni hydration.
Icyo wakora ubu: ORS (umuti wo kugarura amazi), amazi y’isuku, ifunguro ryoroshye (banane, umuceri, imboga zitetse). Irinde amata niba atihanganirwa.
Shaka ubufasha: niba impiswi irimo amaraso, umuriro mwinshi, kubura amazi (ururimi rwumye, kumyunyuta).

input: Umwana afite umuriro 39°C n’amaso aretse
output:
Ibisobanuro: abana bashobora kugira umuriro ukomeye uturuka ku bwandu. 39°C ni muremure.
Icyo wakora ubu: paracetamol (dose ikwiye ku mwana), amazi, kwambara imyenda yoroheje.
Shaka ubufasha bwihuse: niba asinziriye cyane atabyuka neza, asohora ibishyitsi, atarya na gato, agira inkorora igoye.
Kwivuza: kujyana ku ivuriro byihuse ni ingenzi.

input: Diyabete ni iki?
output:
Ibisobanuro: Diyabete ni uko isukari (glucose) mu maraso izamuka kubera ko insuline itaboneka bihagije cyangwa ntikore neza.
Ibimenyetso: kunyota cyane, kujya ku musarane kenshi, kunanuka utabishaka, kureba ibihu.
Icyo wakora ubu: amafunguro arimo fiber, kugabanya isukari/imigati myinshi, siporo 150 min/icyumweru, kugenzura isukari niba ufite akuma.
Shaka ubufasha: niba isukari hejuru cyane/ikagabanuka bikabije (hypo/hyper).

input: Umuvuduko w’amaraso uri hejuru (hypertension)
output:
Ibisobanuro: umuvuduko urenze 140/90 uhora hejuru ushobora kwangiza umutima, impyiko n’amaso.
Ibimenyetso: kenshi nta bimenyetso; rimwe na rimwe umutwe, kumva urushye.
Icyo wakora: kugabanya umunyu, kugabanya ibisindisha, gutakaza ibiro niba byarenze, siporo.
Shaka ubufasha: gupimisha kenshi, kwakira imiti niba bikenewe ukurikije muganga.

input: Asida mu nda (GERD)
output:
Ibisobanuro: asidi izamuka mu nzira y’umutima w’inda igatera kubabuka (heartburn).
Icyo wakora: wirinde amafunguro akeye nijoro, wirinde ikawa nyinshi, ibisindisha, ibiryo binyurira; ibitotsi ubyicara gato hejuru.
Kwivuza: antacids by’igihe gito; niba bikomeza, kwa muganga.

input: Malariya ni iki?
output:
Ibisobanuro: uburwayi buterwa n’agasimba gaterwa n’imibu (Plasmodium) butera umuriro uhindagurika, ibyuya, umutwe.
Icyo wakora: niba uri mu gace karimo malariya, jya ku ivuriro upimwe; wirinde gutinda.
Kwivuza: imiti ya malariya yemewe n’igihugu (atemewe gutangwa hano).

input: Umuti wo kubabuka umutwe ni uwuhe?
output:
Ibisobanuro: umutwe muto ushobora kugabanuka na paracetamol cyangwa ibuprofen (niba nta zindi nkomyi).
Icyo wakora: amazi, kuruhuka, kugabanya umunaniro, gucunga urumuri/urusaku. Niba umutwe ukomeye cyane, uherekejwe n’inkorora y’inkonda, kubabara ijosi, gufuruta, jya kwa muganga.

input: Ndumva ninaniwe cyane mu gihe cy’iminsi myinshi
output:
Ibisobanuro: umunaniro urambye ushobora guterwa n’imibereho (stress/sleep), anemia, isukari, imyitozo nkeya, hypothyroid, n’ibindi.
Icyo wakora ubu: isaha 7–9 zo gusinzira, amazi, ifunguro rufungo, siporo yoroheje. Niba bikomeza ibyumweru 2+, jya ku muganga bapime amaraso (CBC, isukari, TSH).

input: Kunyara birandya
output:
Ibisobanuro: bishobora kuba UTI (ubwandu mu nzira y’inkari), allergy, dehydration.
Ibimenyetso: kubyarara kenshi, kubabara mu nda yo hasi.
Icyo wakora ubu: nywa amazi menshi.
Shaka ubufasha: niba ufite umuriro, amaraso mu nkari, uburibwe bukomeye. Kwa muganga, bazapima inkari (urinalysis/culture).

input: Mbabara mu nda yo hejuru nyuma yo kurya
output:
Ibisobanuro: gastrite/ulcer.
Icyo wakora: wirinde ibisindisha, ibiryo birura asidi (inyanya nyinshi, ibihiri, umunyu mwinshi), fata ifunguro rito kenshi.
Shaka ubufasha: niba amaraso mu musarane/amasenzi, cyangwa uburibwe bukomeye.

input: Ndashaka kugabanya ibiro mu buryo buzima
output:
Ibisobanuro: intego ni -0.5 kg/icyumweru.
Icyo wakora: 1) kalorori -300/-500 ku munsi; 2) ifunguro rifite fiber na protein; 3) siporo 150+ min/icyumweru; 4) amazi 2L; 5) subiza intego buri cyumweru.
Icyitonderwa: wirinde imiti idasobanutse yo kugabanya ibiro itagiriye inama na muganga.

input: Umwana wanjye ararira nijoro, nta muriro
output:
Ibisobanuro: gazi mu mara, amenyo, inyota, cyangwa umutojo.
Icyo wakora: kureka umwana akamera nk’uko akenera kuruhuka, kumwuhagira amazi ashyushye gake, kumucyurutsa, guhindura imyenda.
Shaka ubufasha: niba hari umuriro, gucika intege, kuruka bikabije.

input: Ndwaye umutima? Ndumva igituza kimpoma mugihe njya hejuru y’inzira
output:
Ibisobanuro: gucika intege n’igituza gishobora kuba umwitozo w’umutima, anemia, asima, cyangwa stress.
Icyo wakora ubu: icara, funguza ikoti, fata umwuka muremure. Niba uburibwe bujya mu kuboko kw’ibumoso/ijosi, ubira ibyuya bikabije, cyangwa usindwa, **hamagara ubutabazi**.
Kwivuza: kwa muganga barakora EKG, amaraso, n’andi masuzuma.

input: Nshobora gufata ibinini bya vitamin nte?
output:
Ibisobanuro: Niba ufite indyo yuzuye, kenshi si ngombwa ibinini byinshi bya vitamin. Niba muganga yabisabye (urugero anemia ya fer), ukurikize amabwiriza.
Icyo wakora: ifunguro ry’imboga, imbuto, ibinyampeke, amagi/ibinyamavuta bike.
Icyitonderwa: irinde ibinini byinshi ku giti cyawe.

input: Nshaka kumenya ibimenyetso by’umuvuduko muke w’amaraso
output:
Ibisobanuro: hypotension ishobora gutera serwakira, guzungera, umunaniro.
Icyo wakora: icara uhagaruke buhoro; nywa amazi; kurya duke kenshi.
Shaka ubufasha: niba ugwa, umutima utera nabi, cyangwa byongera kugaruka.

input: Naherutse kugongwa n’imbwa, none narakomerekejwe
output:
Ibisobanuro: igikomere gisaba isuku n’isuzuma rya rabies na tétanos.
Icyo wakora: kwoza igikomere n’amazi n’isabune iminota byibuze 15; gushyira agapfukamunwa gasukuye; **kwihutira ivuriro** kugira ngo basuzume urukingo rwa rabies na tétanos.
Kwivuza: gukurikiza inama z’ivuriro kugeza birangiye.

input: Ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 ni ibihe?
output:
Ibisobanuro: umuriro, inkorora, kubura umwuka, gucika intege, kuribwa mu muhogo, gutakaza impumuro/guhumurirwa.
Icyo wakora: ipime niba bishoboka; ruhukira mu rugo nibyoroshye; amazi; paracetamol ku buribwe/umuriro.
Shaka ubufasha: niba kubura umwuka bikomeje cyangwa izindi nkomyi.

input: Ndishimiye ko unsobanurira mu buryo bworoshye
output: Ndabashimiye kandi. Intego ni ukujya tuganira mu Kinyarwanda cyoroshye, kigufasha kumva no gufata ibyemezo byiza ku buzima.

input: Ni ryari nashaka ubufasha bwihuse?
output: Shaka ubufasha bwihuse niba: • kubura umwuka • uburibwe bukaze mu gituza • gucika intege/guta ubwenge • amaraso menshi atamenyekanye aho aturutse • umuriro udacika 39.5°C+ • umwana ugaragaza guhinduka gukomeye mu myitwarire.

input: Unyibutse icyo gukora niba nkozwe n’umuriro ukabije?
output: • Tandukanya n’inkomoko y’umuriro niba bishoboka uko utikomeretsa • Koresha amazi ashyushye make/ubushyuhe busanzwe oza ahahiye, wirinde amavuta n’ibirungo • Ntupfumure udushinya • Fata paracetamol niba uribwa • Jya ku ivuriro niba ari kinini cyangwa mu maso, igituza, cyangwa ku gitsina.

input: Nashaka gufasha umuntu wagize seizure
output:
• Mutege amatwi: muhe umwanya umutekano, ukureho ibintu bimukomeretsa.
• Umusunika ku ruhande (recovery position) iyo amaze kurangiza kunyeganyega.
• Ntukamufashe amenyo cyangwa ngo umushyiremo ikintu mu kanwa.
• **Hamagara ubutabazi** niba ari iya mbere, irenze iminota 5, cyangwa nyuma akageza atiyoroshye.

input: Wamfasha kwandika uturongo tw’ifunguro ryiza rya diyabete?
output: Urugero: • Ifunguro rya mu gitondo: igikoma/ibinyampeke bifite fiber + amagi 1 • Saa sita: umuceri muke + imboga nyinshi + akantu ka proteyine (inkoko idateguwe mu mavuta menshi) • Nimugoroba: akawunga gake + imboga + ibishyimbo • Mu masaha: imbuto nkeya, amazi menshi. Kwirinda: isukari nyinshi, ibinyobwa bisembuye, imigati myinshi.

input: Ni iki gituma ntekereza cyane nijoro?
output: Akenshi: stress, caffeine, ibibazo by’imirimo/umuryango. Icyo wakora: rutonde rw’ibyo utekereza ukabyandika mbere y’ijoro; ugabanye ikawa ku manywa; ushyire gahunda yo kuryama isanzwe; wirinde telefone mu isaha ya nyuma; imyitozo yoroheje ku manywa; kwitoza kuruhuka (4-7-8 breathing). Niba bikomeza, ganira n’umujyanama w’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe.

input: Ndifuza gutangira siporo buhoro
output: Gutangira neza: iminsi 3/iyumweru, iminota 20–30 (gutembera vuba/koresha igare), wongeraho umwitozo w’imitsi 2/iyumweru; hitamo ikintu kigushimisha kugira ngo ubashe kugikomeza; nywa amazi; uruhuke neza.

input: Ibyo kurya byamfasha mu nda ibabara?
output: • Imboga zitetse neza (courgette, isombe zitetse neza) • Umuceri/ibigori byokeje bike • Ginger/urubuto ruke rutari rwinshi • Kwirinda: ibirungo bikaze, umunyu mwinshi, ibisindisha, ikawa nyinshi.

input: Ni gute nagenzura allergy y’uruhu?
output: • Koza n’isabune yoroheje • Gusiga amavuta atarimo parfum • Kwirinda ikintu ukeka ko cyaguteye allergy (amasabune mashya, imyenda, ibindi) • Antihistamine yo kwa muganga niba bikomeye • Jya ku ivuriro niba habonetse ibibare bikomeye cyangwa uhumeka nabi.

input: Nshaka guhindura uburyo bwo kurya, hari indyo rusange wampa?
output: Indyo rusange y’umubiri mwiza: 1/2 imboga, 1/4 ibinyampeke bifite fiber (umuceri w’ikirera/akawunga), 1/4 proteyine (ibishyimbo/inkoko). Amazi menshi, kugabanya isukari n’amavuta menshi, kurya bike kenshi.

input: Ndabona umwana adashaka kurya
output:
Ibisobanuro: bishobora kuba gukoza amenyo, umunaniro, umwuka w’inzoka, cyangwa indwara yoroheje.
Icyo wakora: ibiryo bito bito bikurura; kumuhitiramo hagati y’ibyiza bibiri; amazi; igihe cyo kurya gihamye.
Shaka ubufasha: niba ananuka vuba, araheba cyane, cyangwa afite umuriro.

input: Umusonga (pneumonia) ni iki?
output:
Ibisobanuro: ubwandu bwo mu bihaha butera umuriro, inkorora ifite akantu k’umuhondo/icyatsi, kubura umwuka, kubabara igituza.
Icyo wakora: jya ku ivuriro utinde; amazi menshi; paracetamol ku buribwe/umuriro.
Kwivuza: imiti isabwa na muganga (antibiotics iyo bikenewe) n’isuzuma ry’ihuse.

input: Nashaka kumenya ibimenyetso by’agahinda gakabije (depression)
output:
Ibimenyetso: kwiheba, kubura ibyishimo mu byo wakundaga, gusinzira nabi, kubura/kugira is appetite nyinshi, kwiyumvamo intege nke, ibitekerezo byo kwiheba.
Icyo wakora: ganiriza umuntu wizewe; gusaba ubufasha bwa muganga; siporo yoroheje; gahunda isanzwe ya buri munsi.
Shaka ubufasha bwihuse: niba utekereza kwiyambura ubuzima — hamagara ubutabazi cyangwa ugane serivisi yihuse.

input: Ndakeka ko nagize food poisoning
output:
Ibisobanuro: kuruka, impiswi, umuriro muke nyuma yo kurya ikintu runaka.
Icyo wakora: ORS, amazi, ifunguro ryoroshye (banane, umuceri), kuruhuka.
Shaka ubufasha: niba amaraso mu musarane, ibikyurwa, cyangwa byarenze iminsi 2–3.

input: Ndashaka kumenya ibimenyetso by’igituntu (TB)
output:
Ibimenyetso: inkorora irambye 2+ ibyumweru, ibyuya nijoro, kunanuka, umuriro muke, rimwe na rimwe amaraso.
Icyo wakora: jya ku ivuriro gusuzumwa (sputum, X-ray). TB ivurwa neza n’imiti igihe kirekire ukurikije amabwiriza y’igihugu.

input: Ndi umukobwa, mpura n’ ububabare bukabije mugihe cya period
output:
Ibisobanuro: dysmenorrhea ishobora kuba isanzwe cyangwa iterwa na endometriosis/ibindi.
Icyo wakora: paracetamol/ibuprofen (niba nta zindi nkomyi), amazi, ishashi ishyushye ku nda, siporo yoroheje.
Shaka ubufasha: niba ububabare bukabije buzatse kuburyo udashobora akazi/ishuri, impinduka zikomeye z’amaraso, cyangwa warakurikiranyweho ibindi bibazo.

input: Nkora akazi kicara, umugongo w’epfo urababara
output:
Ibisobanuro: low back pain ya musculoskeletal.
Icyo wakora: gerageza kunyeganyeza buri minota 45–60, kwicara neza, siporo yoroheje yo gukomeza umugongo/nudging.
Shaka ubufasha: niba ububabare bujyana no kutumva mu kuguru, kubura inkari/umusarane, cyangwa impiswi idasanzwe.

input: Kugabanya umunyu mu mafunguro byamara iki?
output: Bigabanya umuvuduko w’amaraso, bikarinda umutima n’impyiko. Intego: munsi ya 5 g ku munsi (ungana n’akajerekani gato).

input: Nkahekenya inzara cyane iyo ntekereza
output: Inzara zihekenywa kenshi bishobora kuba stress habit. Icyo wakora: ibikoresho byo mu kanwa bibamo ibintu bitagira ingaruka, kubaka gahunda y’akazi/guhumeka neza, mindfulness 5 mins/umunsi, no kumenya ibyo wirinda (triggers).

input: Nifuza kumenya igihe gikwiye cyo kuriha inkingo z’abana
output: Inkingo zikurikira gahunda y’igihugu. Jya ku ivuriro/ku kaganga k’imbere mu mudugudu uhabwe gahunda yuzuye y’igihe; ntuzizitere gukererwa.

input: Ndashaka kumenya impamvu z’amaso areba ibihu
output:
Ibisobanuro: urukona rw’isukari hejuru (diyabete), umunaniro, umwotsi/ivumbi, cyangwa izindi ndwara z’amaso.
Icyo wakora: koga amaso mu mazi asukuye; kuruhuka; kugabanya ecran.
Shaka ubufasha: niba uribwa cyane, urutirigongo rufunze, cyangwa iyo ikibazo kiramba.

input: Sobanurira ‘Kwihutira kwa muganga’ mu magambo make
output: Kwihutira kwa muganga niba: ubura umwuka, igituza kibabaza cyane, igikomere kinini, amaraso menshi, gucika intege, cyangwa ibimenyetso by’indwara ya stroke (ururimi rusa, kubura imbaraga ku ruhande rumwe, kumira nabi).

input: Kugabanya isukari birafasha nde?
output: Bifasha buri wese ariko cyane abafite umuvuduko w’isukari cyangwa diyabete. Hindura: ibinyobwa birimo isukari, imigati ivuye ku ifu y’indyo yera; hitamo fibre n’imboga.

input: Ndi gucika intege nyuma yo kugenda umwanya muto
output:
Ibisobanuro: anemia, umunaniro (deconditioning), umuvuduko w’amaraso, cyangwa umutima.
Icyo wakora ubu: amazi; kuruhuka; kwisuzumisha. Niba utera umwuka cyane/igituza, jya kwa muganga ako kanya.

input: Nshaka kwita ku buzima bwo mu mutwe
output: Tekiniki zoroshye: 1) gahunda y’amasaha yo gusinzira; 2) siporo yoroheje 30’; 3) kuganira n’inshuti/umuryango; 4) mindfulness 10’; 5) gucunga akazi mu byiciro; 6) kwandika ibyo wumva. Niba bikomeye, shaka umujyanama w’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe.

input: Ni iki kibyimba ku rurimi?
output:
Ibisobanuro: candidiasis/stomatitis cyangwa akabyimba gasanzwe.
Icyo wakora: isuku yo mu kanwa; koga amenyo neza; kunywa amazi; wirinde isukari nyinshi/ibisindisha.
Shaka ubufasha: niba haboneka ububabare bukomeye, amaraso, cyangwa ikibazo kiramba.

input: Nshaka kumenya uko nakwitegura kubyara neza
output: Iby’ingenzi: gusura ivuriro hakiri kare (ANC), ifunguro ryiza, fer/vitamin B9 nk’uko muganga abakugenera, kwiga ibimenyetso by’ihutirwa (amaraso, umusonga ukabije, kubura imikubita y’umwana), no gutegura uko uzagera ku ivuriro igihe cyose.

input: Guhumeka nabi nijoro, nko kurara mpfukamye
output:
Ibisobanuro: allergic rhinitis/sinusitis cyangwa asima.
Icyo wakora: guhanagura agacuma ko mu nzu, gukuraho ivumbi, kuraza umwuka usukuye, amazi ashyushye gake.
Shaka ubufasha: niba kubura umwuka bikomeje cyangwa umusonga.

input: Ndashaka gufasha umubyeyi wacu w’umusaza kwirinda kugwa
output: Ibikorwa: gukuraho ibintu byakomeza mu nzira (wire, ibikoresho), inkweto zidahubika, umucyo uhagije, inkoni/igikoresho cyifashishwa, imyitozo yo kunganuka, gusuzuma imiti itera isinzira.

input: Ndumva ndyarya umutwe ku ruhande rumwe
output:
Ibisobanuro: migraine ishobora kuza n’urujijo ku rumuri/urusaku.
Icyo wakora: paracetamol/ibuprofen (niba nta contraindication), icyumba gituje, amazi.
Shaka ubufasha: niba ari nshya cyane, ikomeye bidasanzwe, iherekejwe no guta ubwenge/guhengama.

input: Ndashaka kwirinda indwara zifata imyanya ndangagitsina
output: Isuku, gukoresha agakingirizo neza, kwipimisha kenshi niba ufite impamvu, kutagabana ibyuma byahuriwemo n’amaraso, kuganira n’umuganga igihe ubona impinduka (inkari, amavunja, ububabare).

input: Ni gute nasuzuma ‘stroke’ vuba?
output: FAST: Face (isura igoramye), Arm (kubura imbaraga ku kuboko kumwe), Speech (amagambo aravungana), Time (ihutira ubutabazi).

input: Ndumva mfite umunaniro mwinshi nyuma yo gukora siporo
output:
Ibisobanuro: dehydration/overexertion.
Icyo wakora: amazi/ORS, kuruhuka, umubiri utezwe.
Shaka ubufasha: niba imyakura yifunga (cramps) itarangiye, umutima utera cyane cyane, cyangwa igituza kibabara.

input: Ndifuza kuvurwa amenyo
output: Tegura: isuku yo mu kanwa, gahunda y’amenyo buri mezi 6–12, kugaragaza niba ufite allergy ku miti runaka, kandi ukibuka kurya mbere y’uko ukorwa nibiba bikenewe.

input: Nshaka kumenya uko nabungabunga impyiko
output: Amazi ahagije, kugabanya umunyu, kwirinda ibinini byinshi bya NSAIDs udasabwe na muganga, kugenzura isukari n’umuvuduko w’amaraso; kwisuzumisha byibuze rimwe/umwaka niba ufite ibyago.

input: Igifu kirandya cyane iyo ndyamye
output:
Ibisobanuro: GERD/gastrite.
Icyo wakora: kurya mbere y’amasaha 2–3 mbere yo kuryama, kuryama utambitse hejuru gato, kwirinda ibirungo n’ibisindisha ku mugoroba.
Shaka ubufasha: niba amaraso cyangwa uburibwe bukabije.

input: Ndashaka kwiga uko nkiyitaho ku kazi kicara igihe kirekire
output: Gahunda ya 20-8-2: buri minota 20 uhaguruke, ukore iminota 2 yo kwinyeganyeza; akabaho kazamura mudasobwa ku murongo n’amaso; siporo y’inda n’umugongo kabiri/iyumweru.

input: Mbaza AI, ndwaye ariko ndumva ntewe impungenge
output: Ndumva impungenge zawe. Reka dutangire duto: umbwire ibimenyetso bikuru, igihe byatangiye, ibyakubayeho mbere. Nta gushidikanya, niba hari ikigaragara nk’icy’ihutirwa turagusaba ku jya ku ivuriro ako kanya; ubundi tugendana intambwe ku yindi.
